Buy Direct Companies assists clients who are seeking to take their business to the next level and/or develop a product and take it to market. We facilitate their company’s growth by collaborating with them first to create a master vision, and then develop and implement strategies to obtain the vision. Our primary focus is working with real estate companies, generating multi-billion dollar development deals in all areas of real estate, in particular multi-family residential and commercial projects. Our expertise in generating marketing initiatives and creating demand by establishing relationships between international buyers and sellers creates huge profit opportunities for our clients. Clients include: Hedge Funds,All Federal Housing Agency,Wells Fargo, Bank of America, NationStar, Hud, Fannie Mae, Freddie Mac, Inremreo.com, Plasmology4, Google.com,  CO-Signer.com, Apple,Microsoft, Amazon, Lifelock, PowerCoco, Ford Motors,Ringling Bros, Beamz Interactive, MusicandMemory.org, ReplyBuy.com, Greater Phoenix Real Estate Alliance (GPREA), CNN Microsoft. Nike, Adidas, Puma, Spalding, Hanes, Disney (licensing of products), Mattel, QVC, Univision , Walgreens, Home Shopping Network, Coca-Cola, Pepsi, Starwood,  Hilton, Hyatt, Sony, Apple, Gamestop, Target Stores, Wal-Mart, K-Mart, Sears, Speedo, NBA, NHL, MLB, MSL, PGA, LPGA, Johnson & Johnson, Abbott Labs, Ace, HBO, NBC, ABC, CBS, America Online, All Areas of Entertainment , Medical and Sport industry.

Experience resolving as well as identifying title issues pre or post foreclosure which can be handled through the REO, Deed in lieu or for Short Sale disposition of the property. SpecialtiesConcentrating in all legal matters related to REO closings as a partner with Boiko and Osimani for over a Decade. EXPERIENCED IN DIFFICULT TITLE CURATIVE RESOLUTION for marketable-insurable real estate title. Representing Hedge Funds, Private Investors, Servicers, Mortgage Companies, Banks and Private Mortgage Insurance entities.About IN REM REO ServicesIn Rem REO Services is a nationwide resource for the REO closer. We work with REO management to get your assets closed. We have a first-rate staff of experienced Real Estate Professionals who take pride in providing the best services for our clients. We offer individualized attention with every REO closing for a flat rate fee. We are not a title company. We place the order with the title company. Therefore, we offer an objective perspective in working with title already in place or from any title company the client prefers. We work with Fidelity National Title, First American Title, Land America-Commonwealth and Stewart to name a few and assist in solving title issues which affect most files post foreclosure. We are the solution between the foreclosure attorney and title company to assist in getting assets closed quickly. We have closed thousands of files over the years for title companies and foreclosure attorneys that do not want to be bogged down with difficult REO closings. Getting started is easy. All we need is the property address and tax id number and we will order the title either preliminary (prior to contract) or when the file goes under contract for purchase. Remember, the client can choose the title company if there is a preference. Headquarters3435-41 N.Lincoln Ave. Chicago, IL 60657 United States Websitehttp://inremreo.com

Marc Cohen comes to J Kaufman Companies and J Kaufman Consulting with over 30 years of highly proven experience as a visionary global international leader with top-level global business organizations, executives and business owners. As CEO and President of J Kaufman Companies and J Kaufman Consulting he will generate that same expert business acumen by envisioning, developing, and implementing new strategic synergies to take J Kaufman Companies business to new heights. This will create a paradigm for the 21 st century that impacts the quality of life for businesses, governments and individuals throughout the WORLD.J KAUFMAN COMPANIES (formerly DisabilityWorks,inc.) is a strategy/consulting firm that focuses on developing innovative solutions for corporations, government agencies, non for profits and educational institutions. With an emphasis on the diversity, disability & aging space J Kaufman Companies is building its strategies around two fundamental models, " The Adaptation Construct" and "The Design for Life" methodology setting us apart from other firms offering cutting edge knowledge that will enhance any organizations bottom line on multiple levels.Interested in working with corporations, government agencies and educational institutionsWorking on Issues such as : Customized Strategies, IndividualExecutiveCoaching,Marketing/BrandingIndividual Employee Development, Accessibility/Adaptive Technology/Inclusive Design, Shadow Consulting, Workshops, Political Consulting, Messaging,Media Strategy,Motivational SpeakingSpecialties: J Kaufman Companies  is a firm who's goal is to help organizations engage in innovative solutions that will drive results on all levels. With an emphasis on diversity disability. Capitalizing on this knowledge J Kaufman Companies is creating A NEW PARADIGM FOR THE 21st CENTURY  that impacts the quality of life for business, governments, educational institutions, and individuals throughout the WORLD.
Executive Director: Beamz  Music Therapy Education for Special Needs

Beamz Interactive takes pride in providing a highly effective music therapy system that has proven to help individuals with Autism, Alzheimer’s disease, TBI (Traumatic Brain Injury), etc., as well as those in a hospital, rehabilitation, senior care, and hospice setting. We work alongside major non-profit organizations to develop needed music therapy education/special needs lesson plans and software applications, along with using Beamz innovative hardware.

As the Founder and CEO of Buy Direct Development International Companies, an global international organization that specializes in envisioning, developing, and implementing visionary strategies solutions to take multi billion businesses to the next level. My current focus is assisting businesses that have NEEDED VALUE in All areas of International Network Marketing,  Real Estate, Healthcare. Green Energy, Medical, E- Mobile Platform  RevenueTexting Communication, Technology, Food and Clothing, Marc will envision their future business organization model and orchestrate a plan to achieve it by putting a strategic expert team in place, creating multiple revenue streams within their organizations, and making the necessary major contacts. Marc's expertise in building strategic international relationships and connecting others has always been key to his tremendous success, as well as the success of his clients. Marc thrive on working with global high-level individuals, an organizations where his expert visionary and networking skills will drive his clients organizations revenue and profitability upward.after recrutting and staffing expert level indivisible within each high level category.Specialties: VISIONARY INFLUENCER !!!!
